improvements.title: Add input validation to user registration
improvements.description: Add email and password validation to the registration endpoint. Email should be valid format, password should be at least 8 characters with 1 number and 1 special character.

improvements.title: Add unit tests for payment processing
improvements.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the payment processing module, covering success cases, failure cases, and edge cases like network timeouts.

improvements.title: Refactor database connection pooling
improvements.description: Update the database connection module to use connection pooling with a max of 10 connections. Add proper error handling and retry logic.
